title: APEJES Academy
text:
APEJES Academy de Mfou is a <a href="Cameroon">Cameroon</a>ian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Yaounde">Yaounde</a>. They are a member of the <a href="Cameroonian%20Football%20Federation">Cameroonian Football Federation</a> and <a href="Elite%20One">Elite One</a>, the topflight football league of Cameroon.
Stadium.
Currently the team plays at the <a href="Stade%20Ahmadou%20Ahidjo">Stade Ahmadou Ahidjo</a>.
